why_us.title: Buy Tickets Easier
why_us.desc: We make it easier for people to buy tickets

why_us.title: Using NEP-171 NFT Collectibles
why_us.desc: Making it impossible for people to clone or scam the ticket generated

why_us.title: QR Code As Proof
why_us.desc: We use a QR code as proof so event organizer can get accurate data on the number of event attendees

why_us.title: Gift Tickets Easier
why_us.desc: With us, it easier to gift tickets to other wallets

why_us.title: Focusing on NEAR Community
why_us.desc: We are focusing on NEAR community when they create events, EOs and  business owners whose products are subscriptions
